Build-Depends: bison, chrpath, debhelper-compat (= 13), docbook, docbook-dsssl, docbook-xml, docbook-xsl, flex, libldap-dev, libmemcached-dev, libpam0g-dev, libpq-dev, libssl-dev, libxml2-utils, openjade, opensp, postgresql-server-dev-all, xsltproc
Package-List: libpgpool-dev deb libdevel optional arch=linux-any,kfreebsd-any libpgpool2 deb libs optional arch=linux-any,kfreebsd-any pgpool2 deb database optional arch=linux-any,kfreebsd-any postgresql-17-pgpool2 deb database optional arch=linux-any,kfreebsd-any
Testsuite-Triggers: default-jdk, libpostgresql-jdbc-java, locales-all, make, postgresql, postgresql-common
Uploaders: Christoph Berg <myon@debian.org>, Marco Nenciarini <mnencia@debian.org>, Adrian Vondendriesch <adrian.vondendriesch@credativ.de>,
